description: The Government of Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa by March 31, 2023.

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=============================

**Reference:** WS3708956971

**Publication Date:** October 24, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** November 8, 2022 @ 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Status:** Exired

**Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to suppliers who are registered under various trade agreements, including Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and others.

**Delivery Zone:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Vendor Contact:**
Alexandre Mallette, Canadian Government
alexandre.mallette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Contract Description:**
Transport Canada requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Ottawa by March 31, 2023. The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments are available on the SAP Ariba platform after logging in with a valid Government of Canada profile.

**Procurement Details:**
The unspsc codes for this procurement are 56101700, 56111600, 56111604, and others, which cover various categories of office furniture, lighting, and power components.

**Notification:**
To access the full RFP, please register and login to your SAP Ariba account or visit the provided links. Please refer to the SAP Ariba platform for the complete and up-to-date tender specifications.

Note: You should review and align your response according to your country’s standards. Since the original data was presented in the text written in English, you may need to consult a French version. | Do not forget to preserve the links appended to the notice URL necessitates SAP Ariba authorization and
evaluation criteria in low price. To accomplish this you can briefly summarise the necesary Statements. .
